system.description: • Zombie: Liches are necromancers first and foremost. The undead they raise through the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.Zombie]{zombie} spell are permanent, and they may raise @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.Skeleton]{skeletons} just like @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.Zombie]{zombies} as they choose. Some liches have built up entire armies of the undead at their disposal.
